<h1>nuxt-schema-org</h1>

[![npm version][npm-version-src]][npm-version-href]
[![npm downloads][npm-downloads-src]][npm-downloads-href]
[![License][license-src]][license-href]
[![Nuxt][nuxt-src]][nuxt-href]

Nuxt Schema.org lets you generate Schema.org graphs which can help your site appear with rich search results.

New to Schema.org or SEO? Check out the [Schema.org](https://nuxtseo.com/learn/mastering-meta/schema-org) guide to learn more about why you might want to use this module.

## Features

- üòé Simple API based on [Google](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/structured-data/search-gallery) and [Yoast](https://developer.yoast.com/features/schema/overview) best practices
- üßô 30+ Nodes with automated relations, date, URL resolving and more for best practice Schema.org
- üí° Simple global meta provides for minimal boilerplate
- üå≥ Minimal code, optimised for tree-shaking and SSR
- Nuxt Dev Tools integration

## Installation

Install `nuxt-schema-org` dependency to your project:

```bash
npx nuxi@latest module add schema-org
```

üí° Need a complete SEO solution for Nuxt? Check out [Nuxt SEO](https://nuxtseo.com).

## Documentation

[üìñ Read the full documentation](https://nuxtseo.com/schema-org) for more information.
